body_html: If I understand correctly, tf.tile can't change the dimension of a tensor. What is the best way to cast a tensor of dimension [a,b,c] to a tensor of dimension [a,b,c,1,1]? It feels strange writting things like tf.pack([tf.pack([x])])
body_text: If I understand correctly, tf.tile can't change the dimension of a tensor. What is the best way to cast a tensor of dimension [a,b,c] to a tensor of dimension [a,b,c,1,1]? It feels strange writting things like tf.pack([tf.pack([x])])
body: If I understand correctly, tf.tile can't change the dimension of a tensor. What is the best way to cast a tensor of dimension `[a,b,c]` to a tensor of dimension `[a,b,c,1,1]`? It feels strange writting things like `tf.pack([tf.pack([x])])`
